You enter the sonic universe and experience a series of fetishes that you never thought possible.
Can't wait to see what you write. Please add. Do not care what goes on in the story. This one is completely up to you.

Rules

No turning guy characters into girls
No Spelling or grammar errors
NO FEMALES

Other than that you are welcome to post

Those who decide to post a chapter will get gift points. How many you get is based on what I think about the chapter. P.S. I don't have very many so the max I will Give out is 300. I you get ten points then you did a crappy job. If you get three hundred the you did the best that you could have possibly done.
